channel.title: Lxc on Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Lxc on Personal Blog

item.title: [HTB] Machine: Obscurity
item.description: Obscurity Enumeration nmap └─$ nmap -Pn -p- 10.10.10.168 --min-rate 5000 Starting Nmap 7.94 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-10-29 20:06 GMT Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.168 (10.10.10.168) Host is up (0.17s latency). Not shown: 65531 filtered tcp ports (no-response) PORT STATE SERVICE 22/tcp open ssh 80/tcp closed http 8080/tcp open http-proxy 9000/tcp closed cslistener Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 41.33 seconds └─$ nmap -Pn -p- -sC -sV 10.

item.title: [HTB] Machine: Carrier
item.description: Carrier Enumeration nmap └─$ nmap -Pn -p- 10.10.10.105 --min-rate 5000 Starting Nmap 7.94 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-10-23 19:29 BST Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.105 (10.10.10.105) Host is up (0.10s latency). Not shown: 65450 filtered tcp ports (no-response), 83 closed tcp ports (conn-refused) PORT STATE SERVICE 22/tcp open ssh 80/tcp open http Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 26.37 seconds └─$ nmap -Pn -p22,80 -sC -sV 10.

item.title: [HTB] Machine: Tabby
item.description: Tabby Enumeration nmap └─$ nmap -sC -sV -Pn 10.10.10.194 Starting Nmap 7.93 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-07-01 16:48 BST Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.194 (10.10.10.194) Host is up (0.18s latency). Not shown: 997 closed tcp ports (conn-refused) PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 8.2p1 Ubuntu 4 (Ubuntu Linux; protocol 2.0) | ssh-hostkey: | 3072 453c341435562395d6834e26dec65bd9 (RSA) | 256 89793a9c88b05cce4b79b102234b44a6 (ECDSA) |_ 256 1ee7b955dd258f7256e88e65d519b08d (ED25519) 80/tcp open http Apache httpd 2.
